mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TBL_AUCTION (ID, ART_ID, USER_ID, AUCTION_START_DATE, AUCTION_START_PRICE, AUUCTION_ESTIMATED_PRICE, AUCTION_ATRACTED, AUCTION_BID_PRICE, AUCTION_BID_DATE) VALUES ( SEQ_AUCTION.NEXTVAL, #{artId}, #{userId}, #{auctionStartDate}, #{auctionStartPrice}, #{auctionEstimatedPrice}, #{auctionAttracted}, #{auctionBidPrice}, #{auctionBidDate} )
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM TBL_AUCTION TAU JOIN TBL_ART TAR ON TAU.ART_ID = TAR.ID JOIN TBL_ART_IMG TAI ON TAI.ART_ID = TAR.ID

SELECT TBS.USER_NAME, TBM.MAIL_TITLE, TBM.MAIL_CONTENTS, TBM.MAIL_SEND_TIME FROM TBL_MAIL TBM JOIN TBL_USER TBS ON TBM.SEND_USER_ID = TBS.ID JOIN TBL_USER TBR ON TBM.RECEIVE_USER_ID = TBR.ID WHERE TBS.ID = #{id}
